title: Lambda function to retrieve deleted S3 versioned objects
description: This function will help to retrieve the S3 objects that's deleted in a versioning-enabled bucket.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This snipped creates a Lambda function in Python helps to retrieve an S3 object that was deleted in a versioning-enabled bucket.
This function will only retrieve S3 Objects which has Delete Marker as Latest Version.

authors.headline: Presented by Arun Thangavel
authors.name: Arun Thangavel
authors.bio: Solutions Architect, Worldwide Public Sector at AWS
